sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.wfhideemptyfields</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>wfhideemptyfields</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var wfhideemptyfields = Class.create();
wfhideemptyfields.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getFieldsEmpty: function() {
        var emptyFields = '';
        var gr = new GlideRecord('u_assessment_results');
        gr.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_id'));
        var fields = new GlideRecordUtil().getFields(gr);
		var fieldLen = fields.length;
        for (var num = 0; num < fieldLen; num++) {
            var field_name = fields[num];
            if (gr[field_name] == '') {
                if (emptyFields.length === 0) {
                    emptyFields = field_name;
                } else {


                    emptyFields += ',' + field_name;
                }
            }
        }


        return emptyFields;

    },

    getDemandTask: function() {
		var sysid = this.getParameter("sysparam_dmnid");
		var value = false;
        var dmnTask = new GlideRecord("dmn_demand_task");
        dmnTask.addQuery('parent', sysid);
        dmnTask.addEncodedQuery('state<3^correlation_display=CMS - Initiative Refinement');
        dmnTask.query();
        if (dmnTask.next()) {
           value = true;
        }
		return value;

    },
    


});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>K095239</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-11-06 06:46:45</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>a08f1496db16b15491a9a19d13961958</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>23</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>wfhideemptyfields</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a08f1496db16b15491a9a19d13961958</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2024-02-04 17:26:16</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
